did.abstract: One 1868 award of merit issued to Christine Armbruster from the Bions Academy and one 1874 confirmation certificate issued to Armbruster from the Evangelical Lutheran Church in Brooklyn and written in German.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The two items in this collection are housed in a single folder with no particular arrangement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Christine Armbruster certificates, 1977.541, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Award of merit issued to Christine Armbruster from the Bions Academy, located on Henry Street in Brooklyn, N.Y., dated 1868; and a confirmation certificate issued to Armbruster from the Evangelical Lutheran Church in Brooklyn, dated 1874. This latter certificate is written in German.
